mapper.select: SELECT mentorNum, memberEmail, categoryNum, mentorSubject, mentorContent, mentorPrice, ableDay, sTime, eTime FROM mentor WHERE memberEmail = #{memberEmail}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO mentor(mentorNum, memberEmail, categoryNum, mentorSubject, mentorContent, mentorPrice, ableDay, sTime, eTime) VALUES(mentor_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberEmail}, #{categoryNum}, #{mentorSubject}, #{mentorContent}, #{mentorPrice}, #{ableDay}, #{sTime}, #{eTime} )
